# environmentalSoundReduction

**Type Property**

A quantity sample type that measures the difference in sound intensity when wearing headphones that lower environmental sound levels.

## Declaration

```swift
static let environmentalSoundReduction: HKQuantityTypeIdentifier
```

## Discussion

These samples use sound pressure units (described in [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKUnit]). They measure discrete values of the equivalent continuous sound pressure level, described in [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantityAggregationStyle/discreteEquivalentContinuousLevel]. Environmental sound reduction values are automatically collected when wearing supported headphones.

## Hearing

- **environmentalAudioExposure**: A quantity sample type that measures audio exposure to sounds in the environment.
- **headphoneAudioExposure**: A quantity sample type that measures audio exposure from headphones.
